医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
高尔基体在增强 T 细胞抗癌功能方面发挥着至关重要的作用高尔基体对蛋白质进行修饰、分类和包装，以将其发送到最终目的地，无论是在细胞内还是细胞外。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241123/Golgi-apparatus-plays-crucial-role-in-enhancing-T-cell-function-against-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241123/Golgi-apparatus-plays-crucial-role-in-enhancing-T-cell-function-against-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9610f6fe-0287-46ba-a95e-e868d189485c Sat, 23 Nov 2024 23:50:46 -0500 Golgi apparatus plays crucial role in enhancing T-cell function against cancer
研究表明，将家务活视为学习机会可以鼓励孩子的自主性耶鲁大学研究人员的一项新研究表明，如果孩子穿衣服或做其他简单的家务活被视为学习机会，父母就不太可能干预。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241123/Framing-chores-as-learning-opportunities-encourages-child-autonomy-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241123/Framing-chores-as-learning-opportunities-encourages-child-autonomy-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ae4c5e6-9590-46ad-8580-aa1b53890f08 Sat, 23 Nov 2024 23:45:32 -0500 Framing chores as learning opportunities encourages child autonomy, study shows
酒精使用被发现是青少年吸食大麻的主要因素UTHealth Houston 本月在《社会科学与医学》杂志上发表的研究表明，与人口因素无关，饮酒是青少年吸食大麻的最常见预测因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241123/Alcohol-use-found-to-be-major-factor-in-cannabis-vaping-among-youth-and-young-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241123/Alcohol-use-found-to-be-major-factor-in-cannabis-vaping-among-youth-and-young-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=07ac264c-42bf-4ef0-b36a-9f85a68097fc Sat, 23 Nov 2024 23:37:01 -0500 Alcohol use found to be major factor in cannabis vaping among youth and young adults
NREM 睡眠通过大脑同步提高认知能力众所周知，睡眠可以增强认知能力，但其潜在的神经机制，尤其是与非快速眼动 (NREM) 睡眠相关的神经机制，在很大程度上仍未得到探索。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241123/NREM-sleep-boosts-cognitive-performance-through-brain-synchronization.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241123/NREM-sleep-boosts-cognitive-performance-through-brain-synchronization.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0f4d81d-f17e-4d3e-a354-daad1a71e90f Sat, 23 Nov 2024 23:20:38 -0500 NREM sleep boosts cognitive performance through brain synchronization
黎巴嫩针对卫生工作者的袭击达到前所未有的程度截至 2024 年 11 月 21 日，自 2023 年 10 月 7 日以来，黎巴嫩 47% 的医疗保健袭击事件（137 起袭击中的 65 起）已被证明对至少一名卫生工作者或患者造成致命。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241123/Attacks-on-health-workers-in-Lebanon-reach-unprecedented-levels.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241123/Attacks-on-health-workers-in-Lebanon-reach-unprecedented-levels.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8fccfbf8-496d-40fc-85de-0f5758eb2aa9 Sat, 23 Nov 2024 22:24:15 -0500 Attacks on health workers in Lebanon reach unprecedented levels
益生菌可减轻有毒阻燃化学品的影响多溴二苯醚（PBDE）是随处可见的阻燃化学品；室内装潢、地毯、窗帘、电子产品，甚至婴儿产品。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241123/Probiotics-shown-to-mitigate-effects-of-token-fire-pregnant-chemicals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241123/Probiotics-shown-to-mitigate-effects-of-token-fire-pregnant-chemicals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9cbeb2d9-28c2-4ecc-b1d3-2ad3791738bf Sat, 23 Nov 2024 22:20:25 -0500 Probiotics shown to mitigate effects of toxic fire-retardant chemicals
符合美国农业部指南的产前饮食可促进健康的出生体重一项由环境影响基金会资助的新研究表明，在怀孕期间保持符合美国农业部饮食指南的饮食习惯的准妈妈更有可能生出出生体重健康、生长模式稳定的婴儿，并且可能降低儿童后期肥胖的风险。美国国立卫生研究院的儿童健康成果 (ECHO) 计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241123/Prenatal-diet-in-line-with-USDA-guidelines-promotes-healthy-birthweights.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241123/Prenatal-diet-in-line-with-USDA-guidelines-promotes-healthy-birthweights.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d3ebadf3-4840-4cf3-bfbf-9fdb442e9424 Sat, 23 Nov 2024 22:16:25 -0500 Prenatal diet in line with USDA guidelines promotes healthy birthweights
芝加哥大学科学家开发出一种研究 snoRNA 的新方法DNA 和 RNA 的动态、可逆修饰调节基因的表达和转录方式，从而影响细胞过程、疾病发展和整体有机体健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241123/UChicago-scientists-develop-a-new-approach-to-study-snoRNAs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241123/UChicago-scientists-develop-a-new-approach-to-study-snoRNAs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b076e44a-90ba-4298-a132-ea1d07e843f8 Sat, 23 Nov 2024 20:47:58 -0500 UChicago scientists develop a new approach to study snoRNAs
纽约大学朗格健康中心举办年度“Sala-bration”活动，表彰儿科护理领域的领导者纽约大学 Langone Health 于 11 月 12 日举办了年度“Sala-bration”活动，以表彰萨拉儿童和家庭中心护理研究所的有影响力的工作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241123/NYU-Langone-Health-hosts-annual-Sala-bration-event-to-honor-leaders-in-pediatric-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241123/NYU-Langone-Health-hosts-annual-Sala-bration-event-to-honor-leaders-in-pediatric-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bdcd92b6-3a1e-423a-bfe9-73767d3adbae Sat, 23 Nov 2024 20:42:27 -0500 NYU Langone Health hosts annual "Sala-bration" event to honor leaders in pediatric care
研究探讨影响中年上班族运动习惯养成的因素筑波大学的研究人员分析了接受过特定健康指导的中年工人的数据，特定健康指导是日本厚生劳动省实施的一项革命性系统，旨在改善患有代谢综合征和推定有代谢综合征风险的人的生活习惯综合症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241123/Study-explores-factors-influencing-the-acquisition-of-exercise-habits-in-middle-ged-workers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241123/Study-explores-factors-influencing-the-acquisition-of-exercise-habits-in-middle-ged-workers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a719593b-14d8-4801-8573-41b24bfcae1d Sat, 23 Nov 2024 20:27:06 -0500 Study explores factors influencing the acquisition of exercise habits in middle-aged workers
